text: Henry Jon Benjamin (born May 23, 1966) is an American stand-up comedian, actor and voice artist. He is the voice of Bob Belcher in Bob's Burgers. Benjamin was born in Worcester, Massachusetts. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: H. Jon Benjamin
